scripts.build: buble --no modules src/style-mod.js | sed -e 's/export var StyleModule/var StyleModule = exports.StyleModule/' > dist/style-mod.js; cp src/style-mod.d.ts dist/
scripts.prepare: npm run build && npm run build-readme && npm run copy-ts-declarations
scripts.build-readme: builddocs --name style-mod --main src/README.md --format markdown src/*.js > README.md
